title: GPU tensor sum changes after transpose
body_html:
This happens intermittently with CUDA tensors, but never with CPU tensors:

>>> x = torch.rand(3, 4, 5).cuda()
>>> x.sum()
26.833271026611328
>>> x.transpose(0, 1).sum()
26.83327293395996

This happens both on a recent version of PyTorch (0.4.0a0+4970e73) and 0.3.0.

Is this expected behavior?
body_text:

>>> x = torch.rand(3, 4, 5).cuda()

Is this expected behavior?
body:
This happens intermittently with CUDA tensors, but never with CPU tensors:

```
>>> x = torch.rand(3, 4, 5).cuda()
>>> x.sum()
26.833271026611328
>>> x.transpose(0, 1).sum()
26.83327293395996
```

This happens both on a recent version of PyTorch (0.4.0a0+4970e73) and 0.3.0.

Is this expected behavior?
